video.title: Angel
video.synopsis: In this "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" spinoff, a vampire -- and former love of Buffy Summers -- makes Los Angeles his home and redemption his mission.

episodes.synopsis: Angel relocates to Los Angeles, where he encounters a stranger who experiences visions of those in need, and a woman who lives in fear of a vampire.
episodes.title: City Of

episodes.synopsis: Angel tracks a wormlike demon that preys on lonely hearts at a hip nightclub.
episodes.title: Lonely Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Spike and a colleague torture Angel in hopes of ascertaining the whereabouts of a ring that makes the wearer invincible.
episodes.title: In the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Angel aids a woman being stalked by a deranged surgeon who is literally coming apart.
episodes.title: I Fall to Pieces

episodes.synopsis: Cordelia falls in love with a rent-controlled apartment that turns out to be haunted by a ghost, and a demon comes to collect on Doyle's loans.
episodes.title: Rm w/a Vu

episodes.synopsis: An imprisoned thug uses his connections to target Kate for elimination.
episodes.title: Sense & Sensitivity

episodes.synopsis: Doyle receives a surprise visit from his wife, who wishes to terminate their marriage so that she may wed a demon.
episodes.title: The Bachelor Party

episodes.synopsis: Angel can't decide whether or not to renew his relationship with Buffy when exposure to demon blood causes him to become mortal once more.
episodes.title: I Will Remember You

episodes.synopsis: Doyle, Angel and Cordelia assist a clan of mixed-heritage demons targeted for extermination by a group of stormtrooper demons known as The Scourge.
episodes.title: Hero

episodes.synopsis: Wesley joins Angel and Cordelia as he pursues a demon that mutilates creatures possessing supernatural powers.
episodes.title: Parting Gifts

episodes.synopsis: Angel attempts to assist Kate with a murder investigation after discovering that a protégé from his past is responsible for a series of killings.
episodes.title: Somnambulist

episodes.synopsis: Angel and Wesley search for clues when Cordelia wakes up eight and a half months pregnant.
episodes.title: Expecting

episodes.synopsis: Angel finds himself caught in the middle of a war between the sexes when a female demon from another dimension fights against male oppressors.
episodes.title: She

episodes.synopsis: Angel and Wesley perform an exorcism on a young boy possessed by a demon.
episodes.title: I've Got You Under My Skin

episodes.synopsis: Angel seeks to solve a mystery involving Lockley's father and a normally peaceful demon that attacked a delivery man on a subway train.
episodes.title: The Prodigal

episodes.synopsis: Owners of an underground arena enslave Angel and pit him against powerful demons in a fight to the death.
episodes.title: The Ring

episodes.synopsis: A young television actress whose career is in a slump seeks to preserve her youthful appearance by becoming one of the undead.
episodes.title: Eternity

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with Angel meddling in their affairs, attorneys from Wolfram and Hart hire Faith to kill Angel.
episodes.title: Five By Five

episodes.synopsis: Angel attempts to reform Faith as Kate Lockley, Watcher council members and even Buffy Summers pursue her.
episodes.title: Sanctuary

episodes.synopsis: As Angel helps a nerdy billionaire retrieve some compromising photos, he encounters a group of street kids defending against an invasion of vampires.
episodes.title: War Zone

episodes.synopsis: A renegade attorney from Wolfram and Hart joins forces with Angel to stop a blind assassin from killing three children who threaten the firm.
episodes.title: Blind Date

episodes.synopsis: A scythe-wielding demon targets Angel's allies as Wolfram and Hart lawyers attempt to summon a powerful force from beyond.
episodes.title: To Shanshu in L.A

episodes.synopsis: Angel protects a pregnant woman being hunted down by demons after he inadvertently slays her guardian.
episodes.title: Judgment

episodes.synopsis: In the 1950s, Angel aids a woman hiding from her past in a hotel with a long history of death and mayhem. In the present day, Angel hunts a demon.
episodes.title: Are You Now or Have You Ever Been

episodes.synopsis: Angel encounters an amorous Darla in his dreams. And Cordelia vows to protect Gunn after she experiences a vision depicting him in mortal danger.
episodes.title: First Impressions

episodes.synopsis: Angel attempts to help a girl with telekinetic powers before she falls into the hands of Wolfram and Hart.
episodes.title: Untouched

episodes.synopsis: Darla attempts to drive Angel over the edge in hopes of getting him to embrace his dark side.
episodes.title: Dear Boy

episodes.synopsis: Angel meets with a swami to end his obsession with Darla. Meanwhile, Wesley assumes Angel's identity and plays bodyguard to a businessman's daughter.
episodes.title: Guise Will Be Guise

episodes.synopsis: Lindsey finds himself drawn to Darla as her mental state deteriorates.
episodes.title: Darla

episodes.synopsis: Posing as a hip Vegas vampire, Angel infiltrates a gang of thieves bent on stealing a supernatural shroud housed in a museum vault.
episodes.title: The Shroud of Rahmon

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to save Darla's life, Angel must undergo three separate challenges that no one has ever survived.
episodes.title: The Trial

episodes.synopsis: Angel attempts to stop Darla and Drusilla as they embark on a murderous rampage across the city.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: After firing Wesley, Cordelia and Gunn, Angel trains for a showdown with Darla and Drusilla while the others decide what to do with their lives.
episodes.title: Redefinition

episodes.synopsis: Angel helps a woman who runs a worthy charity to avoid being cheated by Wolfram and Hart.
episodes.title: Blood Money

episodes.synopsis: Angel tries to stop a lovelorn physicist from stopping time forever.
episodes.title: Happy Anniversary

episodes.synopsis: Angel, Gunn and Wesley battle zombie police officers who attack street kids.
episodes.title: The Thin Dead Line

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of a 75-year review at Wolfram and Hart, Angel seeks a magic ring that will take him to hell to look for the firm's "senior partners."
episodes.title: Reprise

episodes.synopsis: Angel attempts to reunite with his friends, who are battling some nasty three-eyed demons.
episodes.title: Epiphany

episodes.synopsis: Angel and his friends fight a new vampire running a motivational pyramid scheme. And Cordelia helps her old friend Harmony, who's now a vampire.
episodes.title: Disharmony

episodes.synopsis: Wolfram and Hart arranges for Lindsey to get a new hand, but when it turns out to be evil, Angel investigates the firm's source of body parts.
episodes.title: Dead End

episodes.synopsis: A magic portal from another world brings a nasty demon -- and the Host's cousin -- to Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Belonging

episodes.synopsis: Angel and his friends travel to the Host's home world to look for Cordelia.
episodes.title: Over the Rainbow

episodes.synopsis: Cordelia meets the Groosalugg while Wesley, Gunn and Angel get a good look at the beast who lives within Angel.
episodes.title: Through the Looking Glass

episodes.synopsis: Wesley and Gunn storm the Pylean castle while Angel fights the Groosalugg.
episodes.title: There's No Place Like Plrtz Glrb

episodes.synopsis: As Angel mourns Buffy's death, he battles a lovelorn vampire seeking revenge for the death of his beloved, who was killed by Angel.
episodes.title: Heartthrob

episodes.synopsis: Lilah coerces Angel to help her secure the release of a prisoner the Powers That Be have locked in a fiery prison.
episodes.title: That Vision Thing

episodes.synopsis: Gunn's loyalties are torn between his current demon-hunting associates and his old gang, which now kills demons for fun instead of defense.
episodes.title: That Old Gang of Mine

episodes.synopsis: An old man uses an ancient incantation to switch bodies with Angel.
episodes.title: Carpe Noctem

episodes.synopsis: Fred prepares to go home to her parents -- until she earns a place with the group by figuring out the key to an attack launched by large bug demons.
episodes.title: Fredless

episodes.synopsis: Angel's friends are affected by a man with the power to make other men brutalize women.
episodes.title: Billy

episodes.synopsis: Darla returns and reveals that she's pregnant with Angel's child.
episodes.title: Offspring

episodes.synopsis: As Angel tries to determine what kind of baby Darla will have, Holtz searches for Angel, and Lilah and Nathan send out a SWAT team to find Darla.
episodes.title: Quickening

episodes.synopsis: As Darla goes through a difficult labor, Holtz pursues Angel.
episodes.title: Lullaby

episodes.synopsis: Angel tries to keep his son safe from the many demons, vampires and humans who wish him harm, and Holtz joins forces with another vampire slayer.
episodes.title: Dad

episodes.synopsis: Cordelia learns that her visions will kill her unless she goes back in time and chooses a different path in life -- one that doesn't include Angel.
episodes.title: Birthday

episodes.synopsis: Fred solves a puzzle for a group of demons who literally want to buy her brain, and Angel is hired to clean out a vampire nest.
episodes.title: Provider

episodes.synopsis: Angel and his friends attend a ballet, where Angel realizes he saw the exact same dancers on stage 110 years ago.
episodes.title: Waiting in the Wings

episodes.synopsis: Angel struggles with his jealousy of the Groosalugg and Cordelia's attraction to him. And Gunn and Fred get captured by a tree monster.
episodes.title: Couplet

episodes.synopsis: Wes dreads the fulfillment of the prophecy that Angel will kill Connor, and Sahjhan becomes dissatisfied with Holtz's progress in staking Angel.
episodes.title: Loyalty

episodes.synopsis: To save Connor's life, Wes takes him away from Angel. Angel uncovers Lilah's plot to have him kill Connor. And Holtz finally attacks.
episodes.title: Sleep Tight

episodes.synopsis: As Fred and Gunn search for Wesley, Angel searches for Sahjhan and casts a spell to make him corporeal so he can be killed.
episodes.title: Forgiving

episodes.synopsis: When a demon Gunn once sold his soul to comes to collect on the debt, Angel, Fred and Cordelia help to save him.
episodes.title: Double or Nothing

episodes.synopsis: Angel's hotel is infested by demonic slugs created by the spell he used to alter Sahjhan.
episodes.title: The Price

episodes.synopsis: Angel pursues Connor, who makes a new friend on the streets. Something else comes through the portal from Quor-toth. And Lilah approaches Wesley.
episodes.title: A New World

episodes.synopsis: Holtz insists that Connor rejoin Angel. Justine learns Holtz is back. And the Groosalugg realizes the depth of Cordelia's feelings for Angel.
episodes.title: Benediction

episodes.synopsis: Connor returns to Angel to seek his revenge, and Angel and Cordelia acknowledge their feelings for each other.
episodes.title: Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: As Fred and Gunn search for Angel, Wesley continues his affair with Lilah and conducts his own, more fruitful search.
episodes.title: Deep Down

episodes.synopsis: In his quest to steal an artifact that may help him find Cordelia, Angel competes with a human thief whose body is electrically charged.
episodes.title: Ground State

episodes.synopsis: Angel and his friends discover that Lorne is being held prisoner in a corrupt Las Vegas casino.
episodes.title: The House Always Wins

episodes.synopsis: Unable to remember her friends and scared by the world of demons and vampires, Cordelia takes refuge with Connor, who saves her from a demon attack.
episodes.title: Slouching Toward Bethlehem

episodes.synopsis: Fred discovers that her old physics professor is the one who exiled her to Pylea, and Cordelia begins to wonder about her history with Angel.
episodes.title: Supersymmetry

episodes.synopsis: Lorne's spell to restore Cordelia's memory makes everyone think they're high school students who have been gathered to hunt a vampire: Angel.
episodes.title: Spin the Bottle

episodes.synopsis: As plagues of various pests descend on Los Angeles, the beast Cordelia saw in her vision returns -- and the Apocalypse begins.
episodes.title: Apocalypse, Nowish

episodes.synopsis: Connor gets locked inside Wolfram and Hart with the Big Bad doomsday beast, who turns the legal firm's staff into an army of zombies.
episodes.title: Habeas Corpses

episodes.synopsis: After a group of totems linked to the ancient sun god Ra are killed by the big, bad Beast, Angel realizes he's plotting to turn off the sun.
episodes.title: Long Day's Journey

episodes.synopsis: Angel agrees to try to bring Angelus back. But after the first attempt fails, he and his friends discover a magic sword that might do a better job.
episodes.title: Awakening

episodes.synopsis: Cordelia offers Angelus a deal: If he tells what he knows about the big, bad Beast, she'll give herself to him.
episodes.title: Soulless

episodes.synopsis: After learning the doomsday Beast is working for something bigger and badder than itself, Angel's friends try to return his soul to Angelus' body.
episodes.title: Calvary

episodes.synopsis: While Lorne casts a sanctuary spell on the hotel and Wesley brings in Faith to help get Angelus back, the Beast and its boss also try to woo Angelus.
episodes.title: Salvage

episodes.synopsis: As Faith and Angel continue their battle, the voice of the Beast's master invades Angel's mind.
episodes.title: Release

episodes.synopsis: As Faith and Angelus lie drugged and possibly dying, they flash back to key events from Angel's life. Meanwhile, Willow helps restore Angel's soul.
episodes.title: Orpheus

episodes.synopsis: As Angel tries to remember what Lilah's book said about the Master, Lorne plans a cleansing ritual to regain his empathetic powers.
episodes.title: Players

episodes.synopsis: As Cordelia prepares to give birth, Angel and his friends finally learn that she -- or an evil presence controlling her -- is the Beast's master.
episodes.title: Inside Out

episodes.synopsis: While everyone else worships the beautiful woman Cordelia bore, Fred sees another side of her.
episodes.title: Shiny Happy People

episodes.synopsis: As Jasmine's influence continues to spread, Fred finally tricks Angel into seeing her true nature.
episodes.title: The Magic Bullet

episodes.synopsis: Hiding out in a sewer, Angel and his friends battle a nasty monster who provides some clues that could them help in their battle against Jasmine.
episodes.title: Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: Angel returns from the monsters' dimension and finally defuses Jasmine's all-encompassing powers.
episodes.title: Peace Out

episodes.synopsis: Lilah returns from the dead to offer Angel and his friends full ownership of Wolfram and Hart.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: Old acquaintances reappear as Angel and his friends begin running Wolfram and Hart and try to figure out why they've been selected to do so.
episodes.title: Conviction

episodes.synopsis: Angel and Spike challenge a necromancer who's unhappy with Wolfram and Hart's new leadership.
episodes.title: Just Rewards

episodes.synopsis: Angel tries to help a young woman who has been turned into a werewolf and is being pursued by a group of truly rarified gourmets.
episodes.title: Unleashed

episodes.synopsis: After being menaced by a series of gruesome ghosts, Spike finally comes face to face with the spectral being who's been trying to drag him to hell.
episodes.title: Hell Bound

episodes.synopsis: Strange things happen when Lorne has his sleep removed right before Wolfram and Hart's big Halloween party.
episodes.title: Life of the Party

episodes.synopsis: Losing heart for his own career, Angel befriends another disheartened hero to battle an Aztec-warrior demon that literally eats the hearts of heroes.
episodes.title: The Cautionary Tale of Numero Cinco

episodes.synopsis: When Wesley's father visits Wolfram and Hart, the firm is attacked by a troop of spooky ninja cyborgs.
episodes.title: Lineage

episodes.synopsis: After Spike receives a strange package, Wolfram and Hart employees are possessed by evil, and Angel and Spike's 100-year-old rivalry comes to a head.
episodes.title: Destiny

episodes.synopsis: When Harmony wakes up next to a dead man with vampire bites in his neck, she's afraid she lost her head and killed him.
episodes.title: Harm's Way

episodes.synopsis: Spike takes up the good-deeds business and Eve looses a soul-sucking parasite on Angel, who begins to suffer feverish hallucinations.
episodes.title: Soul Purpose

episodes.synopsis: A deranged vampire slayer is convinced that Spike is the man who kidnapped and tortured her when she was a child.
episodes.title: Damage

episodes.synopsis: When Lindsey returns and tries to defeat Angel using a secret "failsafe" entity, Cordelia emerges from her coma to help save Angel.
episodes.title: You're Welcome

episodes.synopsis: A World War II submarine sailor -- the only man Angel ever turned into a vampire since regaining his soul -- returns to seek his revenge.
episodes.title: Why We Fight

episodes.synopsis: While Nina the werewolf shows romantic interest in Angel, he investigates a demon-infested children's TV program and gets turned into a puppet.
episodes.title: Smile Time

episodes.synopsis: After encountering an ancient sarcophagus, Fred contracts a mysterious illness and lies near death while Angel tries to figure out what's wrong.
episodes.title: A Hole in the World

episodes.synopsis: Mourning Fred's death, Angel vows to find a way to bring her back. This leads to a confrontation with an ancient god that now occupies Fred's body.
episodes.title: Shells

episodes.synopsis: Angel, Gunn and Spike rescue Lindsey from a suburban hell dimension, and Wesley consoles Illyria, who hates her new world.
episodes.title: Underneath

episodes.synopsis: When a warlock brings Connor back into Angel's life, Wesley finds out that Angel has tinkered with the memories of his friends.
episodes.title: Origin

episodes.synopsis: Angel and Hamilton urge Wesley to get rid of Illyria, and Gunn clashes with Angel over the enforcement of an evil demon contract.
episodes.title: Time Bomb

episodes.synopsis: While Angel and Spike go to Italy to retrieve the head of a demon mobster, Fred's parents arrive at Wolfram and Hart looking for their daughter.
episodes.title: The Girl in Question

episodes.synopsis: As Angel grows increasingly hostile, his friends learn he's associating with an evil secret society -- and may have engineered Fred's death.
episodes.title: Power Play

episodes.synopsis: Angel and his friends prepare for their "suicide" attack on the Circle of the Black Thorn.
episodes.title: Not Fade Away
